SEARCH
Package controller

Class CopyMoveScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.CopyMoveScreenController
public class CopyMoveScreenController extends Object
Controller class for the Copy/Move Photo screen of the application. It provides functionality to copy or move a photo from one album to another.
